name: xpeq12d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c3))

comment: Equality deduction for Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)
